fulltext:
Nguyễn Đức Lương Phát
REACTJS DEVELOPER
 Summary
- Looking for more opportunities in Frontend developer
- Self - study and ability to look for information quickly 
- Problem – solving skills and ability to work under high pressure
- Ability to work with system, server, mobile
- All my time for developing
 Education
HCM UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY
2013 - 2018
Major: Mechantronic Engineering
GPA: 8.08/10
 29/01/1995
 Male
 0378306893
 nguyenducluongphat7049@g
mail.com
Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
Work Experience
STYL SOLUTIONS
12/2017 - 3/2019
Embedded
C/C++/C#/Python(Free RTOS, Script, App)
HTML5/CSS3/Javascript Developer - ReactJs
- Building Back Office for manage account (Token), build, monitor and simulation sensor 3D...
- Building templates using Webpack or create-react-app, configuration runtime for
develop/production environments,
- Reactjs for developing single page application
- HTML5/CSS3 ( style, animation...)/React/Redux for developing UI from PSD.
FPT TELECOM
4/2019 - NOW
HTML5/CSS3/Javascript Developer - Vuejs
- Voice Detector (web speech api) on web (chrome, firefox..), on smart tivi (samsung)
- Experience in using Javascript/Jquery to build library
- HTML5/CSS3 ( style, animation...) for developing UI from PSD (fptplay's project).
- Vuejs for developing single page application
- for developing library applied on web, smart tivi.
- Build javascript/jquery library base on attribute, event (trigger, on), dom element for interact
with application as: notification, preview-thumbnails, scroll, switch control library.
- Build Vuejs component for reuse
- Developing decorator and OOP in javascript(proxy, prototype, function, class)
- Using XmlHttpRequest for catching the request
- Nodejs (Buffer, Stream, EventEmitter, Restful, Crawl...)
CERTIFICATIONS
05/01/2019 - 02/03/2019
- Certification of ReactJS at Nordic Coder
SKILL
+ HTML5/CSS3 (cross browser / responsive), SCSS/CSS, Adobe XD, Bootstrap, Socket IO,
React-Bootstrap, Ant Design 
+ Javascript(Proxy, prototype...), Jquery(animate, class, attribute, query dom, trigger...),
Reactjs (context, redux, lazy Loading, middleware...), Redux (logger, thunk ...), Vuejs (mixins,
directives...), NodeJS (ExpressJS, JWT, CRUD, sort, paginate..), MongoDB (Mongoose),
Webpack (alias, chunk...), Restful, PWA, Voice Detector on web
+ Docker, Vagrant, Ubuntu, Window

SKILLS
Javascript
Jquery
ReactJS
VueJS
HTML/CSS3
NodeJS
Logical thinking and creative
Sketch
